name: CrapsVR
description: Play Craps in VR!Experience realistic Vegas action of CrapsVR! Strap on your SteamVR headset, place bets, take odds, and throw some dice! The most authentic craps simulator in VR.Fast-paced casino action!Vegas odds for all bets!Test out new betting strategies before you head to Vegas!Realistic casino environment!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or greater Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater

reviews.review_text: Great game if you want to play some craps outside of Vegas. Feels like you're back in the casino. If only they could make someone to bring me drinks.
